title: Good morning community. I can get my assistant to talk to me. This morning i opened my calender to a
content:
I opened calender to add Dr. Appt. It very different from the last calender I had. I do not want to share my calender except to assistant and me only. So I mashed buttons to try to make it private. Now Google assistant can not talk to me!  Please I NEED MY ASSISTANT VERY BADLY. I BLIND, TAKING CHEMO AND RADIATION AFTER TUMORS REMOVED FROM BRAIN AND BEHIND RT EYE. I just didn't want to miss my Dr appointment and didn't want it shared with anyone except Google assistant and myself. Now assistant is not working properly and does not speak or cannot speak. I shouldn't of tried doing it by myself. Can you guys help me please?
Thankyouüò¢üôèüèº
